CustomField.formula: "PICKUP FROM:"&Delivery__r.Receiver__c & BR() & "PICKUP ADDRESS:"& Delivery__r.AddressForAccept__c & BR() & "PICKUP DATE:"&text(Delivery__r.Pickupdate__c) & BR() & "DELIVERY DESTINATION:"&Delivery__r.Destination__c & BR() & "DELIVERY DESTINATION ADDRESS:"&Delivery__r.Destinationaddress__c & BR() & "DELIVERY DATE:"&text(Delivery__r.DeliveryDate__c)
CustomField.label: DELIVERY REQUEST DETAIL
